p: At present, almost all countries in the world have recognized the seriousness of the COVID-19 pandemic and implemented various measures to curb its development, but asymptomatic patients are not always taken seriously by healthcare workers. Yet, asymptomatic infections of SARS-CoV-2 are probably an important source of transmission. The person with an asymptomatic confirmed case of infection has normal body temperature or is only slightly indisposed [ 18].
